name: 初愈 Initial Heal
description:
一度以为自己是“异类”的它，与被标签为“异类”的他，都孤单的生活在自己的世界里，但意外的邂逅使他们走进了对方的世界，都说心灵的契合能够治愈彼此，可为什么灵魂的交织还是无法抹除心中的苦痛，那就奔跑吧，让心灵的歌曲更加恢弘，让灵魂的邂逅更加深入。

 A white cat who always thought she was an " different", and a boy who was labelled as an " different", they lived alone in their own world. But An unexpected encounter brings them into each other's world. It is said that fitted soul can heal each other, but why after so much experience, she still can not heal him? Are they really unable to shake off the shadows of the past? Then please run, let the song of the soul getting grander, let the soul meets with each other deeper.
